attributes.action: Demobilise the armed forces and spend the money where it is most needed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the UK did not have an armed forces, billions of pounds a year could be spent on health, education, and creating rather than destroying.    Britain will never be invaded so what is the point of spending all this money on an armed forces that will never be used to defend British soil.  Our army causes us more problems than it solves without an armed forces we would not be involved in the Iraq war which enjoys a worldwide lack of support.  Let’s wake up and lose this colossal waste of money.
